This is the area for pages (sections) management of top and bottom menus of the site before registration and after it.
Modification is not available for:
  • the following parts of the top menu before registration: "Registration", "Search", "News"; after registration: "My RealEstate", "Search", "News";
  • parts of the bottom menu before registration and after it: "Contacts".
To create a new section in top or bottom menu, click the button "Add a section". You will be transferred to a page of WYSIWYG-editor, where you will be able to add its name and section's content.
To add a new subsection, click the button "Change: ?" in the table 'Subsections'. You will be transferred to a page of subsections of the selected section. Subsections management (creation, modification, sorting, removal) is similar to sections management.

In members' area links to subsections are displayed in list order on the page of the section after the text of section content. When you choose a definite subsection, its content will be shown under the list of subsections on the page of the selected section.

Newly added section can be adopted for all site language versions., just copy the content of the section into other languages (in other languages the section will be inactive by default), click the language link and edit the content of the section and its subsections.
You can change the position of sections and subsections using the arrows ‘One level higher‘ and ‘One level lower‘. You can also move a section from bottom menu into top one andf vice versa pressing corresponding buttons

It is recommended to create no more than 2 sections in top menu, as top menu includes 3 non-editable sections , despaite of those created by you. In bottom menu the number of sections is not limited.
